      • format

        public MovAvgBuilder format(java.lang.String format)

      • gapPolicy

        public MovAvgBuilder gapPolicy(BucketHelpers.GapPolicy gapPolicy)
        Defines what should be done when a gap in the series is discovered
        Parameters:
        gapPolicy - A GapPolicy enum defining the selected policy
        Returns:
        Returns the builder to continue chaining

      • modelBuilder

        public MovAvgBuilder modelBuilder(MovAvgModelBuilder modelBuilder)
        Sets a MovAvgModelBuilder for the Moving Average. The model builder is used to define what type of moving average you want to use on the series
        Parameters:
        modelBuilder - A MovAvgModelBuilder which has been prepopulated with settings
        Returns:
        Returns the builder to continue chaining

      • window

        public MovAvgBuilder window(int window)
        Sets the window size for the moving average. This window will "slide" across the series, and the values inside that window will be used to calculate the moving avg value
        Parameters:
        window - Size of window
        Returns:
        Returns the builder to continue chaining

      • predict

        public MovAvgBuilder predict(int numPredictions)
        Sets the number of predictions that should be returned. Each prediction will be spaced at the intervals specified in the histogram. E.g "predict: 2" will return two new buckets at the end of the histogram with the predicted values.
        Parameters:
        numPredictions - Number of predictions to make
        Returns:
        Returns the builder to continue chaining

      • minimize

        public MovAvgBuilder minimize(boolean minimize)
        Determines if the model should be fit to the data using a cost minimizing algorithm.
        Parameters:
        minimize - If the model should be fit to the underlying data
        Returns:
        Returns the builder to continue chaining

      • settings

        public MovAvgBuilder settings(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> settings)
        The hash of settings that should be provided to the model when it is instantiated
